title: GPU not detected deeplabcut-docker gui
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

Deeplabcut-docker gui launches but doesn't appear to be using the Nvidia GPU. Once I start analyzing videos CPU usage spikes to 100% but GPU usage is near idle. The console indicates a GPU is not detected `no NVIDIA GPU device is present: /dev/nvidia0 does not exist`. Running deeplabcut-docker bash -v /home/user:/home/user command line + `nvidia-smi` does not detect the command.

### Operating System

Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS

### DeepLabCut version

Docker latest-gui

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

Tesla M40 24 GB

### Steps To Reproduce

1. Fresh install of Ubuntu 20.04.4 plus updates
2. Install Nvidia driver 510.47.03
3. `pip install deeplabcut-docker`
4. `deeplabcut-docker gui`

### Relevant log output

```shell
/usr/local/lib/python3.8/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/engine/base_layer_v1.py:1692: UserWarning: `layer.apply` is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Please use `layer.__call__` method instead.
  warnings.warn('`layer.apply` is deprecated and '
2022-03-14 21:48:57.999821: W tensorflow/stream_executor/platform/default/dso_loader.cc:64] Could not load dynamic library 'libcuda.so.1'; dlerror: libcuda.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory; LD_LIBRARY_PATH: /usr/local/nvidia/lib:/usr/local/nvidia/lib64
2022-03-14 21:48:58.000446: W tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_driver.cc:326] failed call to cuInit: UNKNOWN ERROR (303)
2022-03-14 21:48:58.000717: I tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.cc:163] no NVIDIA GPU device is present: /dev/nvidia0 does not exist
2022-03-14 21:48:58.001672: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:142] This TensorFlow binary is optimized with oneAPI Deep Neural Network Library (oneDNN) to use the following CPU instructions in performance-critical operations:  AVX2 FMA
To enable them in other operations, rebuild TensorFlow with the appropriate compiler flags.
2022-03-14 21:48:58.078094: I tensorflow/core/platform/profile_utils/cpu_utils.cc:114] CPU Frequency: 3399905000 Hz
Starting to analyze %  /app/Downloads/22099Day1.mp4
/app/Downloads  already exists!
Loading  /app/Downloads/22099Day1.mp4
Duration of video [s]:  901.5 , recorded with  30.0 fps!
Overall # of frames:  27045  found with (before cropping) frame dimensions:  1920 1080
Starting to extract posture
  0% 0/27045 [00:00<?, ?it/s]2022-03-14 21:48:59.237911: W tensorflow/core/framework/cpu_allocator_impl.cc:80] Allocation of 1061683200 exceeds 10% of free system memory.
```


### Anything else?

Running on a local display.
